channel.title: Pi dragon claw special please help

item.title: Pi dragon claw special please help
item.dc:creator: @ipkonpcp ipkonpcp
item.description:
@ipkonpcp wrote:

ight guys well ive looked through every single tut on dragon claws that google would bring up and i need help makeing my dclaws hit 4 times like 20-10-5-5 or whatever currently mine hits 20-10-0-0 for example. i would like for someone to explain to me how the codes work for the special because i have same codes as everyone posted on tuts and it doesnt workâ€¦ lemme know if u need me to post codes help is highly appreciated thanks

also my claws 4 hit npc and work like there supossed to heres the codes for npc and player

} c.lastNpcAttacked = i; if(c.projectileStage == 0 && !c.usingMagic && !c.castingMagic) { // melee hit damage applyNpcMeleeDamage(i, 1, Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit())); if(c.doubleHit && !c.usingClaws) { applyNpcMeleeDamage(i, 2, Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit())); } if(c.doubleHit && c.usingClaws) { applyNpcMeleeDamage(i, 2, c.previousDamage / 2); } }

player special if(c.projectileStage == 0 && !c.usingMagic && !c.castingMagic) { // melee hit damage applyPlayerMeleeDamage(i, 1, Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit())); if(c.doubleHit && !c.usingClaws) { applyPlayerMeleeDamage(i, 2, Misc.random(calculateMeleeMaxHit())); } if(c.doubleHit && c.usingClaws) { applyPlayerMeleeDamage(i, 2, c.previousDamage / 2); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Pi dragon claw special please help
